body:
Comment 5 by **nathan.beckmann**: 
That makes sense; the reason for my confusion is that I originally thought c was a
reference (ie, pointer) to the value in the slice. That's what my note at the end of the
first post was trying to say.

I am a little rusty on my compilers, so I was using the colloquial definition of "use".
I suppose I think a different error message would be more helpful, but I can understand
that this is probably not worth anyone's time.

Thanks.
